overview:
Marta Skundric is an Analyst at DN Capital. She has a Master’s degree in European Business from ESCP-EAP European School of Management and a BS in International Relations from London School of Economics and Political Science.

Marta focuses on financial services software and digital media investments. At DN Capital she has participated in a number of transactions in the digital media and financial services space- including Tbricks, an automated trading platform provider in Sweden and OLX, a premier global free online classifieds site. She is actively involved with helping many of DN Capital portfolio companies in various capacities; namely strategy building, business development, and marketing.
